definitions.definition: A crystalline alkaloid (4,5- epoxy -17- methyl -7,8-di dehydro morphinan -3,6- diol ), extracted from opium , the salts of which are soluble in water and are used as analgesics , anaesthetics and sedatives ; it is one of a group of morphine alkaloids .

main_definition: ( biochemistry , pharmacology ) A crystalline alkaloid (4,5- epoxy -17- methyl -7,8-di dehydro morphinan -3,6- diol ), extracted from opium , the salts of which are soluble in water and are used as analgesics , anaesthetics and sedatives ; it is one of a group of morphine alkaloids .
